summary: A simple Retexture of Spazthemax Soul Reaver
descriptionHtml:
I loved Spazthemax Soul Reaver a lot so I asked him if it would be alright if I did a retexture of his soul reaver and thankfully he said yes. Which meant alot to me since I love the LoK Series and I love retexturing. 

Installation:

YOU NEED THIS!
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29168

Use the NMM

or manual download, once that√®s finished open the rar, pull out the Data file and drag and drop into your Drive where skyrim is installed and then steam, then steamapps, common, skyrim and merged with the original data your pc should do the rest.


Credit:
Spazthemax
author: Zazil
